name: Team Communication
long_desc: This mini will introduce you to research and theory on how to create effective teams.  In it, you will learn  leadership strategies for managing projects and getting everyone to contribute to their best capacity  interpersonal skills for negotiating team conflict  communication strategies for working with individuals from very different professional and cultural backgrounds.  techniques for fostering trust and inspiring team innovation and creativity  how to use technology to manage teams that are geographically separated  Professor Joanna Wolfe has been studying student and professional technical teams for fifteen years and is the author of multiple books and awardwinning articles on team communication.  This course will be handson with assigned readings and video cases that are discussed in class with plenty of opportunities to roleplay different communication strategies and techniques.
